content.p: Postgraduate placements provide focused and cost-effective access to specialist expertise that supports the strategic growth of your organisation. We have a range of programmes to suit every type of organisations. Our postgraduates have made an impact on a variety of sectors, working on business critical projects, such as: We offer a seamless advertising and administration process, which includes recruitment and contracting, to allow you to focus on the supervision of the project itself. Placement students are on our payroll so there are no headcount or payroll requirements for the host organisation and our contracts cover Intellectual Property Rights (IPR), commercial confidentiality and Health and Safety. Discuss your project with our team and learn how a postgraduate placement can deliver results. ppnenquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Related services UON researchers and staff contact form Follow us on social media: YouTube | LinkedIn
